big business.translation[0].definitions[: very large companies, considered as a powerful group with a lot of influence
a product or type of activity that people spend a lot of money on
big business.translation[1].definitions[: very large companies considered as a powerful group with a lot of influence
Reformers are trying to cut the links between government and big business.
a product or activity where a lot of money is involved
Trafficking in stolen cars has become big business across eastern Europe.
